fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
eu_initiatives: Our association is interested in all directives involved in petrol measuring systems such as Machinery, ATEX, MID, LV, EMC, etc... as well as other specific directives such as VR2 (2014/99) and 1999/92/EC (ATEX for workplaces)
organisation_name: Comité de fabricants européens d'installation et de distribution de pétrole (CECOD)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
CECOD is the Committee of European Manufacturers of Petroleum Measuring and Distributing Equipment, a non-profit association, providing facilities for its members to share technical information related to fuel measuring and dispensing technologies and processes. 
CECOD members work closely with European Member States and Authorities in all relevant matters in support of its deep commitment to promote the unification of European Legal Metrology, Safety and Environmental legislation together with its subsequent enforcement.
relevant_communication: Goal of our association is to share technical knwoledge allowing harmonized implementation of directives, regulations, standards. Among goals, safety of public is also very important.
